Sniper/Rhinox/Zergling/Oinker


Sniper Fired a rocket off at Anubis.

Rhinox eired a Rocket off at Koga's hip.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zergling ran into battle. "Zergling kill." Zergling jumpped ontop of 
sixshot and started slashing with his sword.

Oinker ran into battle. He fired a rocket at the ball of Koga's back.
